hero.title: Quality & Certificates
hero.description: Production in accordance with international quality standards and full compliance

qualityPolicy.title: Our Quality Policy
qualityPolicy.description1: As Roversan Food, we adopt the highest standards in food safety and quality management.
qualityPolicy.description2: We fully comply with international quality standards with our ISO 9001, ISO 22000, HACCP, Halal, Kosher and GMP certificates.
qualityPolicy.description3: We offer the most reliable and quality products to our customers by performing quality control in all our production processes.

foodSafety.title: Food Safety
foodSafety.description: Food safety control at every stage from raw material entry to final product

hygiene.title: Hygiene Standards
hygiene.description: World-class hygiene rules and cleaning protocols

improvement.title: Continuous Improvement
improvement.description: Continuous review and development of quality management systems

iso9001.title: ISO 9001:2015
iso9001.description: We confirm that our production processes are managed according to international standards with our Quality Management System certificate.
iso9001.scope: Production and sale of food products

iso22000.title: ISO 22000:2018
iso22000.description: We guarantee food safety in all processes with our Food Safety Management System certificate.

haccp.title: HACCP
haccp.description: We analyze and control food safety risks with the Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points system.

halal.title: Halal Certificate
halal.description: We serve Muslim markets with our Halal certificate confirming that production is carried out in accordance with Islamic rules.

kosher.title: Kosher Certificate
kosher.description: We reach a wide market with our Kosher certificate showing that production is carried out in accordance with Jewish religious rules.

gmp.title: GMP
gmp.description: We fully comply with Good Manufacturing Practices standards.

qualityControl.title: Our 5-Stage Quality Control System
qualityControl.description: Each of our products goes through 5 critical stages from production to shipment

raw.title: Raw Material Control
raw.description: All raw materials undergo strict quality control before entering our facility.

production.title: In-Production Controls
production.description: Regular checks are performed at critical control points determined during production.

lab.title: Laboratory Analyses
lab.description: Samples are taken from each production batch and microbiological and chemical analyses are performed.

packaging.title: Packaging Control
packaging.description: At the packaging stage, label information, weight and packaging integrity are checked.

final.title: Final Product Control
final.description: Final checks are made before shipment and products that meet all quality criteria are sent to customers.

assurance.title: Our Quality Assurance
assurance.description: We prove our quality commitment with our certificates at international standards

cta.title: Detailed Information About Quality Certificates
cta.description: You can contact us for more information about our certificates and quality management system.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: By using this website, you are deemed to have accepted the following terms of use. Please read the terms carefully.

general.title: 1. General Use
general.content: This website is operated by Roversan Food. Site content is for informational purposes only and may be changed without prior notice.

property.title: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
property.content: All content, design, logo, text, images and other materials on this website are owned by Roversan Food and are protected by copyright.

restrictions.title: 3. Usage Restrictions
restrictions.intro: You must not use the website for the following purposes:
restrictions.rights: In a way that violates others' rights
restrictions.virus: To spread malicious software or viruses
restrictions.security: In a way that threatens site security

product.title: 4. Product Information
product.content: Product information and prices on the website are for informational purposes. Roversan Food reserves the right to change product features and prices without prior notice.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third party websites. Roversan Food is not responsible for the content of these sites.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Roversan Food cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damages arising from the use of the website.

changes.title: 7. Changes
changes.content: Roversan Food reserves the right to update these terms of use at any time. Changes will be published on this page.

law.title: 8. Applicable Law
law.content: These terms of use are subject to the laws of the Republic of Turkey. In case of disputes, ≈ûanlƒ±urfa courts and enforcement offices are authorized.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: As Roversan Food, we value the security of your personal data and fulfill our obligations under Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data ("KVKK").

data.title: 1. Collected Data
data.intro: The following personal data may be collected through our website:
data.name: Name and surname

usage.title: 2. Purpose of Data Use
usage.intro: Collected personal data is used for the following purposes:

security.title: 3. Data Security
security.content: Your personal data is protected with appropriate security measures against unauthorized access and use.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies
cookies.content: Our website may use cookies to improve user experience. You can control cookies from your browser settings.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.intro: Under KVKK, you have the following rights:
rights.learn: Learning whether your personal data is processed

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.intro: You can contact us for questions about our privacy policy:

disclosure.title: Personal Data Protection Disclosure
disclosure.intro: As Roversan Food, we show maximum sensitivity regarding the security and confidentiality of your personal data. With this awareness and as the data controller under Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data ("KVKK" or "Law"), we would like to inform you about how your data is processed and with whom and under what circumstances it may be shared, in order to enable us to act in accordance with the Law regarding the personal data we have obtained.

section1.title: 1. Identity of the Data Controller
section1.content: As Roversan Food ("Company"), we show maximum sensitivity regarding the security and confidentiality of your personal data. With this awareness and as the data controller under Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data ("KVKK" or "Law"), we would like to inform you about how your data is processed and with whom and under what circumstances it may be shared, in order to enable us to act in accordance with the Law regarding the personal data we have obtained.

section2.title: 2. Processing of Personal Data and Processing Purposes
section2.intro: Your Personal Data is processed by our Company to ensure that services are provided in the best way. In this context, the following data is collected:

dataTypes.identity: Your Identity Information: name and surname
dataTypes.contact: Your Contact Information: email address, phone number, address information
dataTypes.transaction: Your Customer Transaction Data: contact form messages, request information
dataTypes.marketing: Your Marketing Data: cookie records, site usage data

purposes.intro: Your data is processed limited to the purposes listed below:
purposes.legal: Fulfillment of obligations arising from the legislation to which our Company is subject
purposes.service: Responding to your contact requests and providing customer services
purposes.product: Product and service information, providing catalogs and price quotes
purposes.marketing: Carrying out marketing activities, site usage analysis
purposes.analytics: Analysis of site usage with analytical tools such as Google Analytics and Meta Pixel
purposes.quality: Improving service quality and ensuring customer satisfaction

section2.principles: Your personal data is used and processed by Roversan Food with serious confidentiality within the framework and supervision of KVKK for the purpose of serving you. When processing your data, Roversan Food pays attention to compliance with law and the rule of honesty, ensuring that the data is accurate, not used outside the scope of processing, processed for legitimate purposes, kept up to date, and retained for a reasonable period required for the intended purpose.

section3.title: 3. To Whom and For What Purposes Do We Transfer Your Personal Data?
section3.content: Your personal data may be shared with parties that need to be shared due to the nature of the activities we carry out within the scope of applications to be made to improve the quality of the service we provide to you, and with legally authorized official authorities, within the framework of the personal data processing conditions and purposes specified in Article 8 of KVKK, to the extent permitted by the legislation and required by our business processes, for the purposes stated above. In this context, your data may be shared with analytical tools such as Google Analytics and Meta Pixel. This data is processed for the period required by the processing purpose within the framework of our policies and procedures determined in accordance with the Regulation on the Deletion, Destruction or Anonymization of Personal Data, and is deleted when there is no longer a relationship with our Company, or when there is no reasonable or legal necessity or appropriateness.

section4.title: 4. What is the Method and Legal Reason for Collecting Your Personal Data?
section4.content: Your personal data is collected from verbal or written information transmitted to our Company by you, from our email address, our website, our contact form, our social media accounts, and applications and software used within the scope of Company activities, by automatic or non-automatic methods, based on and limited to the legal reasons specified in Article 5 of the Law; explicit provision in laws, establishment, use or protection of rights, establishment or performance of contract, legal obligation of the data controller, legitimate interest of the data controller, and your explicit consent, in accordance with the purposes explained in Article 2 of this Disclosure Text and the basic principles foreseen in the Law.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights Regarding the Protection of Personal Data
section5.intro: You can use the following rights regarding the processing of your personal data by making a written request to our Company. Requests submitted in this context will be concluded within thirty days. As a personal data owner, in accordance with Article 11 of the KVK Law;

rights.learn: Learning whether your personal data is processed
rights.info: Requesting information if your personal data has been processed
rights.purpose: Learning the purpose of processing your personal data and whether they are used in accordance with their purpose
rights.transfer: Knowing the third parties to whom your personal data is transferred domestically or abroad
rights.correct: Requesting correction if your personal data is incomplete or incorrectly processed
rights.delete: Requesting deletion or destruction of your personal data if the reasons requiring its processing disappear, even though it has been processed in accordance with the provisions of the KVK Law and other relevant laws
rights.notify: Requesting notification of the correction, deletion or destruction of your personal data to third parties to whom your personal data has been transferred
rights.object: Objecting to the emergence of a result against you by analyzing your processed data exclusively through automated systems
rights.compensation: Requesting compensation for damage if you suffer damage due to unlawful processing of your personal data

howTo.title: How Can You Use Your Rights Regarding Your Personal Data That You Have Notified Us?
howTo.content: To use your right to apply regarding your personal data within the scope of Article 11 of the KVK Law, through the following methods;

methods.email: By sending an email to info@roversan.com
methods.mail: In writing to Kadƒ±kendi Mah. 8502. Cad. No: 12, Eyy√ºbiye / ≈ûanlƒ±urfa / Turkey

howTo.note: Requests and notifications received through channels other than those specified will not be evaluated. If our Company responds to your application in writing, no fee is charged up to ten pages. If your request is rejected, the reason/reasons for rejection will be justified in writing or electronically.

section6.title: 6. Changes to Data Privacy Principles
section6.content: If there are changes within the scope of the legislation, necessary announcements will be made on our website https://roversan.com, and our Company reserves the right to make changes to ensure compliance with legislative changes in its policies and procedures regarding personal data.

section7.title: 7. Changes
section7.content: Roversan Food reserves the right to make changes to ensure compliance with legislative changes in its policies and procedures regarding personal data.
